message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll really love. I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that.  Could you meet me halfway at $160?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145.
